title: `cc` error linking when using lto and incremental compilation together.
body:
Somewhat trivial test case (doesn't happen with "hello world"):

```toml
[package]
name = "lto-test"
version = "0.1.0"
authors = ["David Ross <daboross@daboross.net>"]

[profile.release]
lto = true

[dependencies]
serde = "1.0"
serde_derive = "1.0"
toml = "0.4"
```

```rust
#[macro_use]
extern crate serde_derive;
extern crate serde;
extern crate toml;

use std::io::Write;
use std::fs::File;

#[derive(Serialize, Deserialize)]
pub struct NonTrivial {
    x: i32,
    y: String,
}

fn main() {
    let x = NonTrivial {
        x: 0,
        y: "azdef".to_owned(),
    };

    let serialized = toml::to_vec(&x).expect("expected serialization to succeed");

    File::create("non_trivial.txt")
        .expect("expected file opening to succeed")
        .write(&serialized)
        .expect("expected write to succeed");

    println!("Success!");
}
```

Output:

```
$ cargo run  --release --verbose

   Compiling serde v1.0.8
   Compiling quote v0.3.15
     Running `rustc --crate-name unicode_xid /home/daboross/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/unicode-xid-0.0.4/src/lib.rs --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 --cfg 'feature="default"' -C metadata=cfdeec4f87e6b478 -C extra-filename=-cfdeec4f87e6b478 --out-dir /home/daboross/lto-test/target/release/deps -L dependency=/home/daboross/lto-test/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow`
```
